name: afni_proc.py
author: AFNI Developers
description: Generate a tcsh script for an AFNI single subject processing stream

inputs.description: Specify the EPI dataset files. (e.g. epi_run1+orig, epi_run2+orig)
inputs.name: EPI Datasets

inputs.description: Specify the subject ID for the script.
inputs.name: Subject ID

inputs.description: Specify the output directory for the script.
inputs.name: Output Directory

inputs.description: Specify the processing blocks to apply (e.g. tshift volreg blur mask scale regress).
inputs.name: Processing Blocks

inputs.description: Specify echo times for multi-echo data processing.
inputs.name: Echo Times

inputs.description: Specify files used for stimulus timing in -stim_times.
inputs.name: Stimulus Timing Files

inputs.description: Specify TR-locked stim files for 3dDeconvolve -stim_file instead of -stim_times.
inputs.name: TR-locked Stimulus Files

inputs.description: Specify additional files to be copied to the results directory.
inputs.name: Additional Files to Copy

inputs.description: Copy the anatomical dataset(s) to the results directory.
inputs.name: Copy Anatomical Dataset

output-files.description: All output files stored in the specified output directory.
output-files.name: Output Files
